background.description: Defines the background tiles. Only one file is allowed

file.description: Defines the file name used for the background tiles. Path is relative to the artset.

width.description: Defines the width of a tile.

height.description: Defines the height of a tile.

nbColumns.description: Defines how many columns the background tiles file has.

lastTile.description: Defines the last ID of the possible tiles.

types.description: Defines the known types of tiles. For example multiple tiles could be used as grass. Used while smart painting.

additionalProperties.description: Contains all the tiles ID which can be used by this type.

levels.description: Defines what the perlin noise generator will use at a given position.

type.description: Defines which tile type should be used for that level.

maxLevel.description: Defines up to which level to use this type. The value is between 0 and 1, the upper level doesn't require this property.

transitions.description: Defines how to mix two types of tiles. Used by the smart tile painting as well as during the area generation.

from.description: Defines the first type of tiles used for the transition.

to.description: Defines the second type of tiles used for the transition.

transition.description: The ID of the tiles used for the transition.

canWalkOn.description: Defines on which tiles the monster can walk.

objects.description: Defines the objects available in the game which can be placed on the map.

additionalProperties.description: Defines an object which can be placed on the map.

file.description: Defines the file name containing the object. The path is relative to the art set.

width.description: Defines how large is the object image.

height.description: Defines how tall is the object image.

groundX.description: Defines the X position touching the ground.

groundY.description: Defines the Y position touching the ground.

x.description: Defines the X offset where the image of the object starts.

y.description: Defines the Y offset where the image of the object starts.

frequency.description: Defines how frequently this object should be placed by the world generator on the map. The value is between 0 and 100.

placeOn.description: Defines how which type of tiles this object can be placed.

collision.description: Defines if actors collide with this object, if not defined then the actors will not collide.

radius.description: Defines the collision radius of the object.

characters.description: Defines the characters available in the game which can be placed on the map.

file.description: Defines the file name containing the character. The path is relative to the art set.

frames.description: Defines the number of frames for a given direction. The middle frame will be the rest position.

directions.description: Defines the number of directions a sprite sheet contains.

groundX.description: Defines the X position touching the ground.

groundY.description: Defines the Y position touching the ground.

imageFrameDivider.description: Number of images rendered before an animation frame is changed.

width.description: Number of pixel width of a single frame.

height.description: Number of pixel height of a single frame.

directionFrames.description: Defines the translation of the direction (0=>right, 1=>bottom, 2=>left, 3=>top) to the actual art.

collision.description: Defines if actors collide with this object, if not defined then the actors will not collide.

radius.description: Defines the collision radius of the object.

monsters.description: Defines the characters available in the game which can be placed on the map.

file.description: Defines the file name containing the character. The path is relative to the art set.

frames.description: Defines the number of frames for a given direction. The middle frame will be the rest position.

directions.description: Defines the number of directions a sprite sheet contains.

groundX.description: Defines the X position touching the ground.

groundY.description: Defines the Y position touching the ground.

width.description: Number of pixel width of a single frame.

height.description: Number of pixel height of a single frame.

imageFrameDivider.description: Number of images rendered before an animation frame is changed.

canWalkOn.description: Defines on which tiles the monster can walk.

directionFrames.description: Defines the translation of the direction (0=>right, 1=>bottom, 2=>left, 3=>top) to the actual art.

collision.description: Defines if actors collide with this object, if not defined then the actors will not collide.

radius.description: Defines the collision radius of the object.
